channel.title: [C4D] Dragon Head & Maxwell Room Test
channel.description:
I havent posted anything in a while, so why i was killing a black dragon in rs... :).... , i thought about trying to make a dragon. I was surprised how nice it looked (Figuring it would've looked worse :P). I may continue this one but maybe not. Also, the reason i haven't kept you updated on my Motorcycle was because the 42 day period for R11 ran out, and there is no way i can work on it and save it anymore. I really don't enjoy keeping C4D open forever either :rolleyes:
Well here's the dragon head: [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/8514/dragonm.png[/img]
If the DOF bothers you ill re-render it later on.
Now for Maxwell... I have heard of maxwell and lately i was wanting to try it. Im still debating in my mind if Maxwell is more worth my time than VRay. So far i have loved the renders it gives but with a lengthy time :(. Im still learning how to make textures but here's one of my test renders on a wood floor i made: [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/4509/kitchenmax1.png[/img]
If i do decide to go with Maxwell, which i most likely will, i will start off with a room because i haven't made one in a while and maxwells powerful rendering will make me eager :)
mmk repli naow.
